title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.12 - Toilet facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.12 - Toilet facilities

State Regulations

Toilet facilities serving temporary food service establishments are to include warm running water, soap and individual paper towels for handwashing by employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
